author: Reuters Editorial
title: Cambridge Analytica files for Chapter 7 bankruptcy
text:
May 18 (Reuters) - Cambridge Analytica, the firm at the center of this yearâ€™s Facebook privacy row, filed for voluntary Chapter 7 bankruptcy in a New York court late on Thursday.
Cambridge Analytica LLC listed assets in the range of $100,001 to $500,000 and liabilities in the range of $1 million to $10 million. bit.ly/2rSb2ex
Cambridge Analytica and its British parent SCL Elections Ltd said earlier this month that they would shut down immediately and begin bankruptcy proceedings after suffering a sharp drop in business. (Reporting by Abinaya Vijayaraghavan in Bengaluru; Editing by Gopakumar Warrier)
